basic_information.scholarship_name: James L. & Carol L. Klages Trumpet Performance Scholarship- NOMINATION
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Donor plans to replenish scholarship fund each year and would like to give close to $1000/year if possible.
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: Music Performance Scholarship with a priority given to a student that is a trumpet player majoring in Music, then open to any brass player, then open to any instrumentalist in the band program. Preference given to a student awarded the previous year, if still meeting the criteria. Eligibility Requirements Complete application and official transcript Available to either resident or non-resident students Full-time student (12+ hours) 3.0 GPA or higher Merit-based music audition for the appropriate studio faculty and band director(s) Priority given to a trumpet player majoring in music, then open to any brass player, then open to any instrumentalist in the band program Preference will be given to student awarded prior year if they continue to meet the scholarship criteria

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
